2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate and FY 2025-2026 City Budget

 08-07-2025
By Resolution 2025-06-R, August 6, 2025, City Council approved a Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate of $0.495000. This rate is the same tax rate as 2024. 
Ordinance 2025-18_Adopted 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate
Ordinance 2025-17_Adopted FY 2025-2026 City Budget
Notice of Public Hearing on Tax Increase
PUBLIC HEARING NOTICE_2025-2026 Proposed Budget & Tax Rate
RESOLUTION 2025-06-R_Proposed 2025 Ad Valorem Tax Rate
Notice of 2025 Calculated Tax Rates
Adopted Fiscal Year 2025-2026 Budget
